posts.post_title: PSA 1 HOFers/T206 wantlist. WTB or WTT
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Frank B

Looking for these players in PSA1. 

Just let me know what you have and asking price.

For trade I have 60+ T206 cards in PSA2 - PSA6

and SGC10-SGC 60. HOFers and Commons.

If open to trade let me know and I'll send the

list in my reply. Thanks 

-edited to add e-mail address, update list and add cards available for trade

Chesboro

Scott
